name: HumanImmunodeficiencyVirusHIVViralLoad
title: Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV)  Viral Load
purpose: (Clinical Focus: HIV infection),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests used for determining HIV viral load as a quantitative or qualitative result.),(Inclusion Criteria: Nucleic Acid Tests (NAT) used to determine HIV-1 and or HIV-2 viral load.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excluded laboratory tests used for HIV genotyping, HIV phenotyping, HIV tropism and HIV mutations.)
